name: Dam-Slam
overview: Your mission is to destroy the headquarters of the secret state police and the suggested method is to fly over in an aeroplane and bomb the nearby hydroelectric dam. Since you have a seemingly unlimited supply of 1000lb bombs on board, this should be a cinch; however, it is not a perfect world, a machine-gun emplacement defends the dam itself and, at the base of the dam, a tank patrols the gorge. Released in the Magazine, Your Computer 1983/12.
